Introduction
This topic contains information on determining unemployability, including
ability to retain employment
when unemployability is established
definition of substantially gainful employment
ability to secure employment
evidence required to establish unemployability
, and
making unemployability decisions
.
title: M21-1, Part IX, Subpart ii, Chapter 2, Section B - Determining Disability, Unemployability, and Marginal Employment for Pension
citation: Part IX, Subpart ii, Chapter 2, Section B
